content:
From: "Yannick Duchêne (Hibou57 )" <yannick_duchene@yahoo.fr>
Hi people,

On the page https://isabelle.in.tum.de/community/Projects
In “Specification Languages”
I read:

But there's no relevant link provided, and the one to DEAXS is broken.
Unless it is private (I would understand), I would like to have a look,
primarily out of curiosity, also because I'm interested in the topic.

From: Andreas Lochbihler <andreas.lochbihler@inf.ethz.ch>
Dear Yannick,

A quick search on the web revealed the following:
The proceedings of the Isabelle Workshop 2007 [1] contain an XML paper
by Harald Hiss, he also had an emerging trends paper on this at TPHOLs
2008 [2]. And finally, there is his PhD thesis [3] (in German).

Hope this helps,
Andreas

[1] http://dream.inf.ed.ac.uk/events/isabelle-ws-2007/isabelle-07.pdf
[2] http://users.encs.concordia.ca/~tphols08/TPHOLs2008/ET/index.html
[3] http://www.freidok.uni-freiburg.de/volltexte/5204/
